en: Finally you have received some feedback that is both valid and actionable. There's only one problem - you're not quite sure you agree with it. While the beta-tester sees it as an annoying problem, you thought it was a feature! What should you do?
It isn't what you wanted, but you're more focused on making a profit than doing what you want.
Maybe a few people won't like it, but you'll be able to look back on your product with pride knowing it has exactly what you wanted it to.
